mapper.select: SELECT c.fullname, c.user_id AS userId, c.comtype, c.description, c.empcount, c.address, c.email, c.tel, c.manager, c.m_tel AS mTel, u.id, u.username, u.pwd, u.question, u.answer, c.com_id AS comId FROM company AS c RIGHT OUTER JOIN `user` AS u ON c.user_id = u.id where u.status=2 limit #{start},#{end}
SELECT COUNT(u.id) FROM company AS c RIGHT OUTER JOIN `user` AS u ON c.user_id = u.id where u.status=2

SELECT COUNT(u.id) FROM company AS c RIGHT OUTER JOIN `user` AS u ON c.user_id = u.id where u.status=2
and( c.fullname like #{param} or c.username like #{param})

SELECT COUNT(u.id) FROM `user` AS u LEFT OUTER JOIN emp AS e ON u.id = e.user_id where u.status=1
and( e.realname like #{param} or u.username like #{param})
